location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire, to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter confirms that supplies of sulphur have been shipped on board the Eliza.William Bruce goes on to state that he will await instructions before sending further supplies, due to the Government of Bombay already having a sufficient quantity of sulphur in store.
